.. _`Upset plot`:

UPSET PLOT
==========

Draw a heatmap from enriched terms and GSEA





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_enrich_upsetplot:
        input:
            rds = "enriched.RDS"
        output:
            png = "upsetplot.png"
        params:
            upsetplot_extra = "n = 5"
        wrapper:
            "0.65.0-211-g6a5c5194/bio/clusterProfiler/upsetplot"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Works on enrichment objects only.

Parameters:
  * upsetplot_extra: Extra parameters for upsetplot, besides "x"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
